SECTION_CONTENT:
Storage Conditions: Store and handle in accordance with all current regulations and standards. Store under water and
an inert gas. Keep container tightly closed and properly labeled. Keep in a well-ventilated area away from incompatible
materials.
Handling Procedures: Handle under water. Avoid breathing vapors. Do not get in eyes, on skin, or on clothing. Use
forceps to handle small quantities of frozen phosphorus. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling.
